job_description: Overview:Wanted: coding ninjas who are fast learners, great communicators, and ping pong or foosball gurus wanting to join one of the Top Employers for Young People and top 5 SaaS companies in Canada!Vision Critical provides technology and expertise for our clients to build and manage online insights communities, engaging with their own consumers and stakeholders on a regular basis through the use of online surveys, discussions, videos and 3D simulations. Our client base includes one third of the world’s top 100 brands and our top-notch professionals are spread across the globe in North America, Europe, Australia, Asia and South Africa.Software Developer (8 month contract) What you’ll learn:Develop using a variety of cutting edge tools and technologies:Languages: C#, HTML5, JavaScript frameworks (JQuery, Backbone.js, RequireJS), CSS3, .NET Technologies, SilverlightDatabases: SQL, Oracle, MongoDBTesting: NUnit, Selenium, SpecflowProgressive Development Methodologies:Fast-paced agile environment with one week sprintsContinuous integration, continuous deploymentTest driven development, paired programmingReady to join our team?If this sounds like the perfect opportunity for you we invite you to apply nowPlease include your school transcripts with your resume or cover letter.Please note that due to the high volume of applications received only short-listed candidates will be contacted. We thank you for your interest in Vision Critical and encourage you to constantly check our website for a list of all current opportunities.
job_requirements: Who You Are:A Computer Science or Engineering student wanting to prove yourself, test your limit, build great software and be mentored by top notch developersTeam player who will contribute to an agile team as an engineer building our industry leading SaaS product suiteDriven, focused and results-oriented always looking to learn cutting-edge technologiesYou want to open doors to possibly start your career with one of the Top SaaS companies in CanadaVery confident with at least one modern programming languageEnjoy learning from hands on experiences such as Hackathons and lunch and learnsYou embrace a work/life balance so you can enjoy all that Vancouver has to offerOpen To All Majors:Yes
